title: 820-2850 I've never seen this
message:
I've not seen this first hand. This looks to me like a failed GPU but I thought the NVIDIA chips were solid... C9560 causing this?
Maybe VRAM or the GPU or the MUX?

title: 820-2850 I've never seen this
message:
[QUOTE="G.Beard, post: 38960"]C9560 causing this?
[/QUOTE]

doesnt look like it. usually wouldn't power on or you get black screen. my bet is on VRAM and GPU.

title: 820-2850 I've never seen this
message: however, I always change that cap whenever I get my hand on that board. check voltage on [URL="https://store.rossmanngroup.com/d3-c7771-c9560-1-piece.html"]C9560[/URL], the voltage should be between 1.35v-1.5v
